sen.j: 新烏丸通（しんからすまどおり）は京都市内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shin-karasuma-doori street is one of the streets running from north to south in Kyoto City.
Shin-karasuma-doori street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.
Shin Karasuma-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は荒神口通から南は二条通まで、河原町通と寺町通の間を走る。
sen.e: Shin-karasuma-doori street runs between Kawaramachi-doori street and Saiwaicho-doori street from Kojinguchi-doori street at its north end to Nijo-doori street at its south end.
Shin-karasuma-doori street runs between Kawaramachi-doori street and Saiwaicho-doori street from Kojinguchi-doori street at its north end to Nijo-doori street at its south end.
Shin Karasuma-dori Street runs between Kawaramachi-dori Street and Teramachi-dori Street from Kojinguchi-dori Street at its north end to Nijo-dori Street at its south end.
sen.cmt: Saiwaicho-doori street→Teramachi-dori Streetに修正、およびShin Karasuma-dori Street, Kawaramachi-dori Street, Kojinguchi-dori Street, Nijo-dori Streetとしました。

sen.j: 延長ほぼ1km、市街地中心部の住宅、商店、手工業などの並んだ通りである。
sen.e: Shin-karasuma-doori street spans over a length of about 1 km in the central zone of the commercial zone, and residences, stores, handicraft facilities line the street.
Shin-karasuma-doori street spans a length of about 1 km in the central commercial zone, and residences, stores, and handicraft facilities line the street.
Shin Karasuma-dori Street spans a length of about 1 km in the central commercial zone, and residences, stores, and handicraft facilities line the street.

tit.e: Main Facilities along Shin Karasuma-dori Street
tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更、Shin Karasuma-dori Streetとしました。

sen.j: 京都府立鴨沂高等学校（入り口は反対側の寺町通）
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Kamofuchi High School (its entrance faces Teramachi-doori street on the opposite side.)
Kyoto Prefectural Kamofuchi High School (its entrance faces Teramachi-doori street on the opposite side.)
Kyoto Prefectural Kamofuchi High School (its entrance faces Teramachi-dori Street on the opposite side.)
Gojoin temple (Sanpokojin)
Gojoin temple (Sanpokojin)
Gojo-in Temple (Sanpokojin)

sen.j: 京都市歴史資料館（入り口は反対側の寺町通）
sen.e: Kyoto Municipal History Reference Museum (its entrance faces Teramachi-doori street on the opposite side.)
Kyoto Municipal History Reference Museum (its entrance faces Teramachi-doori street on the opposite side.)
Kyoto Municipal History Reference Museum (its entrance faces Teramachi-dori Street on the opposite side.)
Shimomitama-jinja shrine
Shimomitama-jinja shrine
Shimogoryo-jinja Shrine
sen.cmt: Shimomitama→Shimogoryoに修正、shrineを大文字に変更

sen.j: 行願寺（革堂）（入り口は反対側の寺町通）
sen.e: Gyogan-ji temple (Kaku-do hall) (its entrance faces Teramachi-doori street on the opposite side.)
Gyogan-ji temple (Kaku-do hall) (its entrance faces Teramachi-doori street on the opposite side.)
Gyogan-ji Temple (Ko-do) (its entrance faces Teramachi-dori Street on the opposite side.)
sen.cmt: 「革堂(こうどう)」の表記を修正、templeを大文字に変更、Teramachi-dori Streetとしました。
